BotPenguin vs interakt
Fuel customer Interakt-ions beyond WhatsApp with BotPenguin
Upgrade your WhatsApp Commerce + Omnichannel chat, marketing automation, 60+ native integrations, templates, and ChatGPT Bot. More Perks for Less Price!
Detailed head-to-head
FREE Forever plan. No Credit Card Required.
What’s the difference between BotPenguin and Interakt?
Because BotPenguin automates your marketing, sales, customer support, and lead generation across all channels. Plus, it offers live chat with human handover and team creation.
Pricing
Interakt has a pricing plan of $292 per annum, while BotPenguin offers a pricing plan of $50 per annum, making it the most cost-effective Interakt alternative.
Number of Chatbots
Interakt and BotPenguin allow unlimited chatbots per account.
Channels
BotPenguin provides omnichannel access to platforms like Website, WhatsApp, FB Messenger, Telegram, and Landing Pages, whereas Interakt does not support Telegram.
Voice-Support
BotPenguin offers voice support through Twilio integration, while Interakt's website does not mention voice support.
Which One is the Best?
Based on the features, channels, and pricing comparison, BotPenguin is the best Interakt alternative.

Why should you look for Interakt alternatives?
Pricing: For a platform only available on WhatsApp and Facebook, Interarkt charges $292 per annum., making it unfeasible for small businesses.
Made for Selling: Interarkt Chatbot is designed for selling, and other functions like appointment bookings, support, lead capture, & more are undermined.
Lack of Integrations: Interkart offers only one app integration in its starter pack. Its eCommerce integration also only includes WooCommerce and Shopify.
No templates: Interakt Chatbot lacks chatbot templates and cannot give a headstart to businesses for their specific use cases.
Self-Serve: Assisted onboarding is only provided in Growth and Advanced plans. The starter pack will have you configure the chatbot by yourself.
Conversion-Based Pricing: After paying upfront, Interakt also requires you to share a fixed amount share on each conversion. Interakt alternatives like BotPenguin has no extra fees.
Try BotPenguin
Interakt alternative: Get BotPenguin for WhatsApp Commerce and beyond
Switch seamlessly 40+ business-ready templates and branding customization.
Get access to native 60+ integrations with hidden fees & add-on costs.
Achieve the highest customer satisfaction levels with omnichannel support!
Refine your social ROI with Drip and Broadcasting campaigns on Meta, WhatsApp, & Telegram.
Train your AI chatbot with conditional flows, FAQs, and ChatGPT Intelligence Infusion.
Offer Live Chat with human handover for most popular CMS —- WordPress, Wix, Custom, or more.

Frequently Asked Questions
Is there a free Interakt alternative?
Yes, BotPenguin offers a free lifetime plan with 2000 monthly messages.
Is there an Interakt alternative for WhatsApp?
Yes, BotPenguin is an Interakt alternative that supports WhatsApp and other platforms like FB Messenger, Telegram, and websites.
Is there an Interakt alternative for WhatsApp businesses?
Yes, BotPenguin is an Interakt alternative that offers WhatsApp automation for managing catalogs, orders, and automated responses for businesses.
Is there an Interakt alternative in India?
Yes, BotPenguin is available as an Interakt alternative in India and offers features like multi-platform integration, live chat, marketing automation, and more.
How does Interakt work?
Interakt is a platform that automates marketing, sales, customer support, and lead generation. It offers live chat with human handover and team creation.
